channel.title: Question regarding choice of server and Client
channel.description: Hello, I need a suggestion on which server to pick. I'm only coding for the fun of it, not looking to bring the server online, though i might ( if I can), i'm just a little under an intermediate at coding private servers. I also need a suggestion on which client to use. And not one that isn't compiled into a jar. file. I have a macbook '07 running tiger 10.4.11, and i can't seem to find the code to compile and run the client files. Any help is appreciated I was coding around the time when moparscape 3.2 came out, so i want to know what servers and clients are like now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 08:28:49 pm[/size][hr]preferably a source that has npc training

item.title: Question regarding choice of server and Client
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

Hello, I need a suggestion on which server to pick. I’m only coding for the fun of it, not looking to bring the server online, though i might ( if I can), i’m just a little under an intermediate at coding private servers. I also need a suggestion on which client to use. And not one that isn’t compiled into a jar. file. I have a macbook '07 running tiger 10.4.11, and i can’t seem to find the code to compile and run the client files. Any help is appreciated
I was coding around the time when moparscape 3.2 came out, so i want to know what servers and clients are like now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 08:28:49 pm[/size][hr]preferably a source that has npc training
